body_html:
I think this tutorial https://caffe2.ai/docs/tutorials#null__multi-gpu-training-with-caffe2 should use the GPU. I don't think Predictor can use GPU at this point in time.

To confirm, are you still getting any warnings when you run Caffe2?

body:
I think this tutorial https://caffe2.ai/docs/tutorials#null__multi-gpu-training-with-caffe2 should use the GPU. I don't think Predictor can use GPU at this point in time. 

To confirm, are you still getting any warnings when you run Caffe2?
